5 follow_human::follow_human():
6  n("~"),
7  sub_yolo(n.subscribe("/darknet_ros/bounding_boxes", 1, &follow_human::callback_yolo, this)),
8  sub_lidar(n.subscribe("/scan_front", 1, &follow_human::callback_lidar, this)),
9  sub_lidar_rear(n.subscribe("/scan_rear", 1, &follow_human::callback_lidar_rear, this)),
10  sub_pid(n.subscribe("/control_effort", 1, &follow_human::callback_pid, this)),
11  pub_cmd_vel(n.advertise<geometry_msgs::Twist>("/cmd_vel", 1)),
12  pub_state_pid(n.advertise<std_msgs::Float64>("/state", 1)),
13  pub_setpoint_pid(n.advertise<std_msgs::Float64>("/setpoint", 1)),
14  f(boost::bind(&follow_human::callback_reconf, this, _1, _2)),
15  use_pid(false)
16 {
17  server.setCallback(f);
18  n.param<int>("/setpoint_height", setpoint_height, 400);
19  n.param<float>("/min_probability", min_probability, 0.5);
20  n.param<float>("/min_range_lidar", min_range_lidar, 0.4);
21  n.param<double>("/kp_lin", kp_lin, 0.168125);
22  n.param<double>("/kp", kp, 0.00038125);
23  n.param<std::string>("/image_topic", image_topic, "/camera_rgb/image_raw");
24  //n.getParam("use_pid", use_pid);
25  ROS_INFO("Init node %s complete", ros::this_node::getName().c_str());
26 
27 
28  rot_vel.data = 0.0;
29  velocity.linear.x = 0.0;
30  velocity.angular.z = 0.0;
31  pub_cmd_vel.publish(velocity);
32 }
33 
34 void follow_human::callback_yolo(const darknet_ros_msgs::BoundingBoxes &bboxes)
35 {
36  int xmin = 0, xmax = 0, ymin = 0, ymax = 0;
37  if (n.hasParam("/min_probability"))
38  {
39  ros::param::get("/min_probability", min_probability);
40  }
41  for (int i = 0; i < bboxes.bounding_boxes.size(); i++)
42  {
43  float prob = bboxes.bounding_boxes[i].probability;
44  if (prob >= min_probability)
45  {
46  xmin = bboxes.bounding_boxes[i].xmin;
47  xmax = bboxes.bounding_boxes[i].xmax;
48  ymin = bboxes.bounding_boxes[i].ymin;
49  ymax = bboxes.bounding_boxes[i].ymax;
50 
51  //calculate width and heigth of bbx
52  bbox_width = xmax - xmin;
53  bbox_height = ymax - ymin;
54  //calculate center of detected object in pixel
55  human_pos_x = xmin + (xmax - xmin) / 2;
56  human_pos_y = ymin + (ymax - ymin) / 2;
57  if (boost::iequals(bboxes.bounding_boxes[i].Class, "person"))
58  {
59  ROS_DEBUG_THROTTLE(5, "Found person");
60  ROS_DEBUG_THROTTLE(1, "BBox \n height: %i\n BBox width: %i", bbox_height, bbox_width);
61  if (!flag_lidar)
62  {
63  if (use_pid == true)
64  {
65  pub_pid();
66  }
67  else
68  {
69  pub_p();
70  }
71  ROS_INFO_THROTTLE(1, "Publishing linear velocity (%f) and angular velocity (%f)", velocity.linear.x, velocity.angular.z);
72  }
73  else
74  {
75  ROS_WARN_THROTTLE(1, "Found obstacle in the way, can not follow");
76  velocity.linear.x = 0.0;
77  velocity.angular.z = 0.0;
78  pub_cmd_vel.publish(velocity);
79  }
80  }
81  else ROS_WARN_THROTTLE(3, "Couldn't find correct class: %s", bboxes.bounding_boxes[i].Class.c_str());
82  }
83  else ROS_WARN_THROTTLE(5, "Probabilty of object %s not high enough %f <= %f ! ", bboxes.bounding_boxes[i].Class.c_str(), prob, min_probability);
84  }
85 }
86 
87 void follow_human::callback_lidar(const sensor_msgs::LaserScan &scan)
88 {
89  if (velocity.linear.x >= 0) // only use this when going forward
90  {
91  if (n.hasParam("/min_range_lidar"))
92  {
93  ros::param::get("/min_range_lidar", min_range_lidar);
94  }
95  auto min = std::min_element(scan.ranges.begin(), scan.ranges.end());
96  ROS_DEBUG_THROTTLE(0.2, "Min LIDAR range= %f", *min);
97  if (*min <= min_range_lidar) flag_lidar = true;
98  else flag_lidar = false;
99 
100  float phi = scan.angle_min;
101  std::vector<float> temp;
102  for (const float r : scan.ranges)
103  {
104  if (r < min_range_lidar)
105  {
106  temp.push_back(r);
107  phi += scan.angle_increment;
108  ranges.push_back(temp);
109  temp.clear();
110  }
111  else
112  {
113  phi += scan.angle_increment;
114  }
115  }
116  ranges.clear();
117  }
118 }
119 
120 void follow_human::callback_lidar_rear(const sensor_msgs::LaserScan &scan)
121 {
122  if (velocity.linear.x < 0) // only use this when going backward
123  {
124  if (n.hasParam("/min_range_lidar"))
125  {
126  ros::param::get("/min_range_lidar", min_range_lidar);
127  }
128  auto min = std::min_element(scan.ranges.begin(), scan.ranges.end());
129  ROS_DEBUG_THROTTLE(0.2, "Min LIDAR range= %f", *min);
130  if (*min <= min_range_lidar) flag_lidar = true;
131  else flag_lidar = false;
132 
133  float phi = scan.angle_min;
134  std::vector<float> temp;
135  for (const float r : scan.ranges)
136  {
137  if (r < min_range_lidar)
138  {
139  temp.push_back(r);
140  phi += scan.angle_increment;
141  ranges_rear.push_back(temp);
142  temp.clear();
143  }
144  else
145  {
146  phi += scan.angle_increment;
147  }
148  }
149  ranges_rear.clear();
150  }
151 }

153 
154 void follow_human::callback_img(const sensor_msgs::ImageConstPtr& msg)
155 {
156 
157  cv_bridge::CvImagePtr cv_ptr;
158  try
159  {
160  cv_ptr = cv_bridge::toCvCopy(msg, sensor_msgs::image_encodings::BGR8);
161  }
162  catch (cv_bridge::Exception& e)
163  {
164  ROS_ERROR("cv_bridge exeption: %s", e.what());
165  return;
166  }
167  image = cv_ptr->image;
168  image_width = image.size().width;
169  image_height = image.size().height;
170  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Image width= " << image_width << "\nImage height= " << image_height << std::endl);
171  sub_img.shutdown();
172 }
173 
174 void follow_human::callback_pid(const std_msgs::Float64 &msg)
175 {
176  ROS_INFO("Control of PID= %f", msg.data);
177  if (msg.data * 0.05 <= 0.6 && msg.data * 0.05 >= -0.6)
178  {
179  velocity.linear.x = get_lin_vel();
180  velocity.angular.z = msg.data * 0.05;
181  }
182  else
183  {
184  velocity.linear.x = 0.0;
185  velocity.angular.z = 0.0;
186  }
187  pub_cmd_vel.publish(velocity);
188 }
189 
190 
191 
192 void follow_human::pub_pid(void)
193 {
194  if (image_width && image_height)
195  {
196  setpoint.data = 0.0; //image_width / 2;
197  state.data = (image_width / 2 - human_pos_x);
198  pub_setpoint_pid.publish(setpoint);
199  pub_state_pid.publish(state);
200  }
201 }
202 
203 void follow_human::pub_p(void)
204 {
205  velocity.linear.x = get_lin_vel() * kp_lin;
206  velocity.angular.z = (image_width / 2 - human_pos_x) * kp;
207  pub_cmd_vel.publish(velocity);
208 }
209 
210 
211 float follow_human::get_lin_vel(void)
212 {
213  float lin_vel = 0.0;
214  lin_vel = ((static_cast<float>(bbox_height) - 770.0) / (450.0 - 770.0)); // Normalize lin_vel so that if distance is between 430 (top speed) and 800 (0 speed).
215  if (std::abs(lin_vel) > 1)
216  {
217  if (lin_vel < 1) lin_vel = -1.0;
218  else lin_vel = 1.0;
219  }
220 
221  return lin_vel;
222 }
223

225 void follow_human::callback_reconf(follow_human_cfg::follow_human_mainConfig &config, uint32_t)
226 {
227  setpoint_height = config.setpoint_height;
228  min_probability = config.min_probability;
229  min_range_lidar= config.min_range_lidar;
230  kp_lin = config.kp_lin;
231  kp = config.kp;
232  image_topic = config.image_topic;
233  //use_pid = config.use_pid;
234  ROS_DEBUG_STREAM("Reconfig called");
235 
236 }
